short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Open links in the tab of your choice
short.da: Ã…bn links i en fane efter eget valg

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
TabTopper lets you decide which tab you want to open links in.

Essential for multiscreen users. Browse on your laptop and open links on another screen, e.g. a projector or your TV.

Use TabTopper though the context menu (by right clicking on links), on ordinary clicks or a keyboard/mouse combination like Shift+click, Ctrl+click and Alt+click.

COMING SOON:
- Support for Apple OSX' keyboard layout.
